title: Ambient Video Game Music - Sailing Ship In A Storm 2
description: Prepare to face the fury of the open sea once more with the highly anticipated sequel to our collection of storm-themed ambience packs.
longDescription:
Prepare to face the fury of the open sea once more with the highly anticipated sequel to our collection of storm-themed ambience packs. This new assembly of 10 packs intensifies the dramatic experience of weathering a heavy storm aboard an old sailing ship, providing game developers with a soundscape that's as thrilling as it is authentic.


The packs in this sequel deliver an even more immersive soundscape. The creaking of the wooden hull has been amplified, with each strain and shudder of the timbers echoing the relentless battle against the storm's onslaught. The increased detail in these sounds transports players directly onto the rain-swept deck of the sailing vessel, making them feel the ship's struggle against the elements.


Adding to the immersive experience are the intensified sounds of waves crashing against the ship's side. These packs capture the stormy sea in all its raw fury, from the towering swells to the foaming troughs, each thunderous crash serving as a potent reminder of the ocean's mighty power. The soundscape pulses with the rhythm of the tempestuous sea, driving the drama and tension of the scene.


This sequel is an essential addition for game developers aiming to create even more exciting, unforgettable maritime experiences. The amplified sounds of the tempest and the ship's reactions, coupled with the thrilling track, deliver a hyper-realistic seafaring adventure that will pull players into the heart of the storm. The potent auditory experience makes players feel as if they are truly at the helm, fighting to steer their ship through the wild, untamed ocean.


This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--

Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--
